plot_summary: A group of friends set out on an adventure to find a hidden treasure in a mysterious island.
In a dystopian future, a young hero leads a rebellion against an oppressive regime.
A romantic comedy about two people who meet by chance and fall in love.
After a devastating war, the last remaining humans struggle to survive against alien invaders.
A detective investigates a series of murders and uncovers a dark conspiracy.
An animated film about talking animals who go on a quest to save their home from destruction.
During World War II, a group of soldiers must complete a dangerous mission behind enemy lines.
A family-friendly movie about a magical journey to a fantastical land.
A gripping thriller about a cat-and-mouse game between a brilliant criminal and a dedicated detective.
A heartwarming drama about a young boy and his bond with a lovable alien from outer space.
